channel.title: New Rs statistics
channel.description:
Usually there are 200 - 210k people playing at the same time during 2 PM PST., Weekends I seen 220k - 240k.
As of tuesday, 2 PM PST there are 166k people & falling. Most people are still trying out bounty hunter.
Funny how 50,000 [u]regular[/u] people quit. thats 25% of their total players you can guess. They will lose minimum 10 million a month from cancelled p2p, After trading goes rogue they will lose another 2 - 5% I am guessing. Summoning skill won't do anything special. RS will be renamed to NOOB-SCAPE, A place with NO Risk
I have had lots of characters & I have cancelled my p2p, Im not going to play so I can get raped like a little girl in a jail cell at bounty hunter.

item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Complete bullshit. They’ve never hit 250k at once before. Do you even think before you post? Assuming all worlds are open to the public and EVERYONE of the where full(2k people) there would be 318k people on.
